description.zh: NocoBase 是一个以可扩展性为核心、开源的无代码开发平台。它让用户无需投入大量开发时间和成本，即可快速部署一个私有、可控且高度可扩展的无代码开发平台。该平台支持复杂业务系统的开发，同时保持了用户友好的可视化配置界面。
description.en: NocoBase is an extensibility-first, open-source no-code development platform. It allows users to quickly deploy a private, scalable, and customizable no-code platform without the need for extensive development time or costs. The platform supports complex business system development while maintaining a user-friendly, visual configuration interface.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 在无代码操作的便捷性与原生开发的灵活性之间取得平衡
- 支持快速部署与轻松扩展
- 插件化架构便于无缝扩展功能

## 功能列表:

- 数据模型驱动设计，支持自定义数据视图（区块）
- 所见即所得（WYSIWYG）界面，便于可视化配置
- 插件化架构，支持自定义扩展
- 提供多种安装方式：Docker、CLI 和源码安装
- 支持无代码与低代码开发场景
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Combines the simplicity of no-code with the flexibility of native development
- Enables rapid deployment and easy scalability
- Offers a plugin-based architecture for seamless functionality expansion

## Features:

- Data model-driven design with customizable data views (blocks)
- WYSIWYG (What You See Is What You Get) interface for easy configuration
- Plugin-based architecture supporting custom extensions
- Multiple installation options: Docker, CLI, and source code
- Supports both no-code and low-code development scenarios
